data.comment: The match is underway in Rome.
Ball safe as Sassuolo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 4, Roma needs to be cautious. Sassuolo have an attacking throw-in.
Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Fabio Maresca.
Sassuolo to take a throw-in in Roma territory.
In the minute 5, Throw-in Roma.
Roma's Henrikh Mkhitaryan misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Sassuolo at Stadio Olimpico.
In the minute 8, Free kick for Roma in the half of Sassuolo.
Pedro (Roma) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Fabio Maresca signals a free kick to Sassuolo in their own half.
In the minute 11, Pedro (Roma) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Sassuolo's Manuel Locatelli gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Roma goal kick.
In the minute 16, Fabio Maresca signals a throw-in for Sassuolo, close to Roma's area.
Roma awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sassuolo's Maxime Lopez has been booked in Rome.
In the minute 20, Corner awarded to Roma.
Edin Dzeko's header is off-target for Roma.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rome.
In the minute 21, Sassuolo's Filip Djuricic is whistled for offside at Stadio Olimpico.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Roma in their own half.
In the minute 23, Can Sassuolo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Roma's half?
Fabio Maresca awards the home team a throw-in.
Roma awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 25, In Rome a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Gonzalo Villar (Roma) has received a yellow card from Fabio Maresca.
Free kick for Sassuolo in their own half.
In the minute 27, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Sassuolo close to the penalty box.
Manuel Locatelli for Sassuolo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Roma have a goal kick.
In the minute 30, Roma have a dangerous throw-in.
Roma have been awarded a corner by Fabio Maresca.
Roma's Pedro breaks free at Stadio Olimpico. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 31, Fabio Maresca awards Sassuolo a goal kick.
Sassuolo's Filip Djuricic is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Roma.
In the minute 34, Roma have been awarded a corner by Fabio Maresca.
Sassuolo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Rome Roma's Pedro is caught offside.
In the minute 37, In Rome Roma attack through Pedro. The finish is off target, however.
Fabio Maresca awards Sassuolo a goal kick.
Throw-in for Sassuolo in the half of Roma.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Roma close to the penalty box.
Free kick Sassuolo.
Pedro (Roma) leaves the pitch after receiving two yellow cards.
In the minute 44, Corner awarded to Roma.
Throw-in for Sassuolo in their own half.
Fabio Maresca signals a free kick to Roma in their own half.
In the minute 45, Sassuolo's Filip Djuricic has run offside.
The first-half is over at Stadio Olimpico.
At Stadio Olimpico, Antonio Mirante has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 46, The ref has blown to start the second-half. Roma kick-off.
The away team replace Maxime Lopez with Giacomo Raspadori.
Throw-in for Roma at Stadio Olimpico.
In the minute 48, Roma have been awarded a corner by Fabio Maresca.
Corner awarded to Roma.
Edin Dzeko (Roma) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 49, Fabio Maresca signals a Roma throw-in in Sassuolo's half.
Corner awarded to Roma.
Can Roma capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sassuolo's half?
In the minute 53, Throw-in Sassuolo.
Roma's Henrikh Mkhitaryan breaks free at Stadio Olimpico. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Sassuolo at Stadio Olimpico.
In the minute 57, Roma pushes forward through Leonardo Spinazzola, whose finish on goal is saved.
Roma have been awarded a corner by Fabio Maresca.
Fabio Maresca signals a free kick to Roma.
In the minute 60, Roma drive into the zone and Edin Dzeko is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
Roma have a goal kick.
Free kick for Roma in their own half.
In the minute 62, Fabio Maresca waits before resuming play because Lorenzo Pellegrini for Roma is still down.
Roma's Lorenzo Pellegrini is back in action after a slight knock.
Important block from the Sassuolo defence as Edin Dzeko fires in a strike for Roma.
In the minute 64, Roma have been awarded a corner by Fabio Maresca.
Roger Ibanez (Roma) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Roma.
In the minute 65, Fabio Maresca awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Sassuolo in the half of Roma.
In the minute 66, Filip Djuricic has recovered and rejoins the match in Rome.
The match at Stadio Olimpico has been interrupted briefly for a check on Filip Djuricic, who is down injured.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rome.
Throw-in for Roma in the half of Sassuolo.
In the minute 68, Fabio Maresca signals a free kick to Sassuolo.
Ball goes out of play for a Roma goal kick.
Fabio Maresca signals a free kick to Roma in their own half.
In the minute 71, Giacomo Raspadori (Sassuolo) gets a yellow card.
Edin Dzeko of Roma gets in a strike, but is off target.
Fabio Maresca awards Sassuolo a goal kick.
In the minute 73, Roberto De Zerbi is making the team's second substitution at Stadio Olimpico with Hamed Junior Traore replacing Filip Djuricic.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rome.
Lukas Haraslin is replacing Jeremie Boga for the away team.
In the minute 75, Lukas Haraslin of Sassuolo is pulled up for offside.
Roma's Henrikh Mkhitaryan gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Sassuolo have a goal kick.
In the minute 77, Goal kick for Roma at Stadio Olimpico.
Edin Dzeko gets his shot on target but fails to score for Roma.
Pedro Obiang for Sassuolo has been booked by Fabio Maresca and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 79, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Lorenzo Pellegrini.
Roma have been awarded a corner by Fabio Maresca.
Lorenzo Pellegrini is back on his feet again.
In the minute 81, Fabio Maresca signals a Roma throw-in in Sassuolo's half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Rome to check on Lorenzo Pellegrini, who is grimacing with pain.
Lorenzo Pellegrini, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Amadou Diawara is the substitute for Roma.
In the minute 82, Giorgos Kyriakopoulos is on a sub for Rogerio for Sassuolo.
Ball goes out of play for a Sassuolo goal kick.
Corner awarded to Sassuolo.
In the minute 84, Ball safe as Roma is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Roma awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Sassuolo in their own half.
In the minute 85, Roberto De Zerbi (Sassuolo) is making a fifth substitution, with Mehdi Bourabia replacing Pedro Obiang.
Borja Mayoral is replacing Edin Dzeko for Roma at Stadio Olimpico.
Roma drive upfield and Leonardo Spinazzola gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sassuolo defender.
In the minute 87, Can Sassuolo capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Rick Karsdorp for Roma has been booked by Fabio Maresca and receives a first yellow card.
Sassuolo drives forward and Mehdi Bourabia gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 88, Roma awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fabio Maresca signals a free kick to Sassuolo in their own half.
In the minute 89, Giacomo Raspadori (Sassuolo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
The home team have replaced Marash Kumbulla with Juan Jesus. This is the third substitution made today by Paulo Fonseca.
Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Fabio Maresca.
Corner awarded to Sassuolo.
Free kick for Roma in their own half.
Can Roma get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sassuolo's half?
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Roma to take a throw-in in Sassuolo territory.
Corner awarded to Sassuolo.
Mehdi Bourabia (Sassuolo) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Roma goal kick.
Roma awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's 0-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
